remarks: Isomorphism H of a lattice glb.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Apr-2014.)
statement:
dihglb.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dihglb.g $e |- G = ( glb ` K ) $.
dihglb.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihglb.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihglb2.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihglb2.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
dihglb2 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ S C_ V ) -> ( I ` ( G ` { x e. B | S C_ ( I ` x ) } ) ) = |^| { y e. ran I | S C_ y } ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d H y $.
$d I x y $.
$d K x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d V y $.
$d W y $.
